definition: will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms.
sentences.chinese: 他看見彼得約翰將要進殿，就求他們賙濟。

sentences.english: A layout of an image to be printed such as a book cover .
sentences.chinese: 雜湊而成的東西將要印刷的圖案設計，如書的封面。

sentences.english: I know you're gonna dump me.
It would cost thousands of dollars have the guitars professionally refinished .
sentences.chinese: 如果要找專業的塗裝師重做漆面將要花很多錢。

sentences.english: After arriving in Switzerland, the imported raw cocoa is subject to a strict quality control.
sentences.chinese: 當可可豆到達瑞士後，將要進行嚴格的質控程序。

sentences.english: We will begin the painful shock experiment in a moment.
sentences.chinese: 馬上我們將要開始一個痛擊實驗。

sentences.english: Peacock also is said to be able to foretell rain, and dances when rain is coming.
sentences.chinese: 據說孔雀能夠預知雨水，將要下雨的時候就會跳舞。

sentences.english: Hello and welcome to Trend UK, your shortcut to popular culture from the British Council. In the next few minutes we’re going to be talking about modern manners.
sentences.chinese: 在接下來的幾分鐘裏，我們將要討論的是現代禮儀。

sentences.english: Something that helped me get a handle on this was mini tasking my to-do list.
sentences.chinese: 有所幫助的事就是將要做的清單上的任務再細分。

sentences.english: The camel is going to eat the flower on the girl's hat.
sentences.chinese: 駱駝將要喫女孩帽子上的那朵花。

sentences.english: These people are not evidence about what might happen in the future -- they are real people suffering today.
sentences.chinese: 這些人的遭遇並不能代表未來將要發生的。

sentences.english: Bonus again being held up, and will Wenzhan after three days.
sentences.chinese: 花紅再次被關押了起來，並且將要在三天以後問斬。

sentences.english: I was about to become the breadwinner for my family and I was 18 years old.
sentences.chinese: 18歲的我將要成爲負擔家計的男人。

sentences.english: The return value designates the slices on which the given query will be executed.
sentences.chinese: 返回值會指定給定查詢將要在其上執行的那些片。

sentences.english: The cell at the top is at prophase, showing the condensing chromosomes prior to their separation.
sentences.chinese: 上面的細胞處於分裂前期，凝集的染色體將要分開。

sentences.english: Separate the essence of the test from the implementation details.
sentences.chinese: 將要測試的業務實質內容與實現細節相分離。

definition: auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
in turn/successively/one after the other/bit by bit
variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
